scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter concerns a request made of Mr. Sickels regarding procuring a position in the Rocky Mtns., a visit by Mr. and Mrs. Bishop, mentions Mr. and Mrs. James Gillespie Blaine, then Speaker of the House.
